titleInfo.title: Interaction of donors with electron deficient low-coordinated phosphorus compounds

mods.abstract: Mono-and bis-donor-acceptor formation (donor=AH(3), Y = N, P, As, Sb, Bi and AH(2), O, S, Se, Te) is discussed on the basis of quantum chemical (ab initio) calculations for pi-bonded low-coordinated phosphorus cations, evaluating new types of bis-donor adducts.

titleInfo.title: PHOSPHORUS SULFUR AND SILICON AND THE RELATED ELEMENTS
